pullrequest.title: Issue#100 wind plugin moved to world plugin

content.raw:
This works really well and will allow a lot of new functionality.  I would recommend considering:

* Adding the plugin to the sandisland.world.xacro file so that the wind is defined for the standards world.
* Adding a demonstration of the functionality by:

    * Adding a standalone example world similar to the one above - with two objects affected by wind.  \(I tried this and it was illustrative to make the coefficients for the light buoy negative so that USV and light buoy moved in opposite directions;\)
    * Add a short tutorial to explain running the demonstration - perhaps a new page under [#!/osrf/vrx/wiki/tutorials/ChangingPluginParameters](#!/osrf/vrx/wiki/tutorials/ChangingPluginParameters)
    * Edit the tutorial at [#!/osrf/vrx/wiki/tutorials/ChangingPluginParameters](#!/osrf/vrx/wiki/tutorials/ChangingPluginParameters) to be consistent with the new design.
    

A few comments below.

Otherwise looks good to me and ready to approve.
